description: This file provides utility functions to handle 'file not found' errors and hook into child process events to detect when commands are missing on Windows platforms within the cross-spawn library.

methods.name: notFoundError
methods.description: Constructs a custom Error object indicating that a command was not found (ENOENT).

methods.name: hookChildProcess
methods.description: Hooks into a child process to emit error events if the process exits with code 1 on Windows, indicating the command might be missing.

methods.name: verifyENOENT
methods.description: Checks if the status code indicates a 'not found' error on Windows during an async spawn.

methods.name: verifyENOENTSync
methods.description: Checks if the status code indicates a 'not found' error on Windows during a sync spawn.
